DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a systematic family assessment in adult preventive health visits increases the detection of risk factors in the spouse or adolescent child of the screened person.
DOC.brief_title: Family Preventive Visits to Detect Risk Factors in the Family
DOC.criteria: Parents of adolescents between 1417 years. Living with single parents. Does not accept participating in the study.
